content: round 120 sts remain round 2 * k7 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 3 *k2 yo sk2p yo k2 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 4 as round 2 round 5 *ssk yo sk2p yo k2tog p1 repeat from * to end of round 90sts round 6 * k5 p1 repeat from * around round 7 * k1 yo sk2p yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 8 as round 6 round 9 as round 7 round 10 as round 6 round 11 as round 7 round 12 as round 6 round 13 as round 7 round 14 as round 6 round 15 k1 *yo sk2p yo sk2p repeat from * around ending yo sk2p yo sk2p you will need to use the first stitch of the next round to make this last decrease work your beginning of round marker will move to after the decrease 60sts round 16 knit rnd17 *yo sk2p yo k1 repeat from * to end of round round 18 knit round 19 *sk2p k1 repeat from * to end of round 30sts round 20 knit round 21 *k1 sk2p repeat from * around k2 16sts round 22 knit round 23 *ssk repeat from * around 8sts cut thread leaving a 3 inch end weave thread through remaining stitches secure and weave in all ends block and enjoy for questions regarding this pattern please email at jknightknits@gmail com follow me on instagram at jknightknits twitter jknightknits1 ravelry id jknightknits
